name: Honey Mustard Crunch (Quaker Oatmeal Squares Low-Fat Snack Mix)
author: Karla Essner

ingredients.name: c. fat free mini pretzel sticks

instructions: Heat oven to 250Â°. Spray 13 x 9 inch baking pan with nonstick cooking spray. In pan, combine cereal and pretzels; set aside. Place margarine in 2-cup microwaveable bowl. Microwave at HIGH 45 sec- onds or until melted. Stir in mustard, honey and garlic salt; mix well. Pour margarine mixture evenly over cereal mixture. Stir evenly to coat. Bake 1 hour, stirring every 15 minutes. Spread on baking sheet to cool. Stir to break up crunch mix. Store in tightly covered contain- er up to 5 days. Makes 10 cups.
